text: وَلَوۡ قَٰتَلَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوَلَّوُاْ ٱلۡأَدۡبَٰرَ ثُمَّ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

translation.en: And if those [Makkans] who disbelieve had fought you, they would have turned their backs [in flight]. Then they would not find a protector or a helper
translation.id: Dan sekiranya orang-orang yang kafir itu memerangi kamu, pastilah mereka akan berbalik melarikan diri (kalah), dan mereka tidak akan mendapatkan pelindung dan penolong
